website_summaries.verdict: Although NeatConnect is a scanner, it is best understood as a so-called "scanning appliance" primarily of interest if you want to send your scans to the cloud.
pros: Scans and manages receipts, business cards, and documents
cons: Included software is highly limited, with an idiosyncratic interface that makes it harder to learn than it should be

customer_reviews.title: It is actually not the scanner I hate but the software
customer_reviews.text: It is actually not the scanner I hate but the software. It does not read and interpret the information well. When exporting a file from neat to my computer as a pdf file 50% of the time I end up with a blank page that when I try to open it I get a message saying there is an error on the page. It makes more work rather than less. Extremly upset that I spent all this money on this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dillow

customer_reviews.title: Initially this worked great. It really helped me to go paperless and ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially this worked great. It really helped me to go paperless and move everything to the cloud...until a couple of months ago it stopped being able to upload to Evernote. Apparently a lot of people are having the same problem because the discussion boards are full of some really upset people. The company isn't very good at communicating what they are doing to fix the problem or if they are doing anything to fix the problem. Emails to them only generate canned responses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner, Software needs help
customer_reviews.text: It's a great scanner, but the input screen is WAY too small. And currently they are having issues with their new web based software crashing with Mac. I contacted them and they confirmed it. It's crashing on both of my MacBook Air's. Also, if would be really good if you could add email addresses in the web app that would show up in the scanner for convenience of scanning to email addresses. This would prevent you from having to input on that tiny screen with your fingers. It's really easy to hit the wrong buttons. That part was really not well planned, but I'm assuming it's a pretty easy fix in the software.
customer_reviews.author: carolmeas

customer_reviews.title: Lots of promises regarding what it can do, however ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of promises regarding what it can do, however I was not impressed with the software to the point of justifying the price - Also some key features and options one has to pay a monthly payment to be able to use them. Considering the price of the device its somewhat ludicrous to still expect the buyer to commit to pay a monthly fee to access said features. After a few of weeks, unimpressed by the performance I returned the device. Don't even miss it
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out by saying this is a very well made scanner. But they could really work on the software. The scans all need some attention, you will need to make sure you re-analyze multiple times and manually grab fields you want to track. For the price I was expecting more but what I got was a glorified scanner that has an all in one software organizer. It is not very intelligent you could get the same results with any hp all in one printer and save your docs to a one drive or drop box if you need to access them on the cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Winter

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to spend endless hour trying to contact Neat support. May be its the Neat company maybe its this seller, but it seems that the support ran out on this unit four months before I bought it... Also after paying $290 for this unit you'll have to pay another $20 a month to use it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good luck using Warranty when it breaks down
customer_reviews.text: It's great until it stops working. My NeatConnect will no longer pull normal paper through to scan. I contacted tech support. They sent instructions, I tried that. Nothing works. It's still under warranty for a couple of more months but now that I've mentioned to them I'd like a refund/replacement/or repair...radio silence. Not a word from them. I would not repurchase due to that.
customer_reviews.author: John Virden

customer_reviews.title: The positive side is it's fast and easy to feed multiple number or size documents
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this to scan and save locally to an external hard drive. Neat does little to nothing to support setting up scanning to your desktop computer. While it states and provides a USB cable there are no instructions on making it connect. What you will find is only information on using the cloud services, they want recurring revenue from your purchase. The positive side is it's fast and easy to feed multiple number or size documents. I will work with this another day to see if there is a way to connect to my Mac external drive, after that it's going back to Amazon. For this i rate the machine as a TWO.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Moore

customer_reviews.title: NeatConnect Cloud Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I love my NeatConnect Cloud Scanner. It has made my life so much easier. It has a kind of intelligence that gets most things filed correctly, and you can move stuff around easily if it gets it wrong. My only complaint with this scanner is the size of the screen. Even though I wanted to use it as a Cloud scanner, I wound up hooking it up to my computer anyway to get things filed correctly. That small complaint is about it. The rest of the technology is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what all the fuss is about.
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. We scan hundreds of receipts every month. It was a perfect solution to our need for organizing our purchases. It works great, and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Willis

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time LCD screen.
customer_reviews.text: The concept behind this neat scanner is excellent. Execution is somewhat lacking.. The keyboard entry has many problems. When you push one letter a different letter will show up on the screen, sometimes a letter push bounces that is to say you will push ones and get two or more letters. That is my major complaint. Otherwise I feel the unit does a good job and is a good early effort in the sophisticated scanning market.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Feed Documents
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible document scanner; standard letter paper jams all the time. Takes 3-4 attempts to scan a document. Touch interface on the front is way too small to type email addresses. Cloud software is a joke, if it can't recognize the document it shows up as unknown, with no easy way to identify the document. Technical support will ask you to take apart your scanners and rotate and bend things to temporarily fix the issue. Worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David Korte

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use software does a great job recognizing invoices ...
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use software does a great job recognizing invoices from small and large companies no matter where we have seen information placed. This has greatly helped office productivity and reduced the risk of fire by archiving our paper record to their cloud service.
customer_reviews.author: Keys

customer_reviews.title: Scans great but scan to Dropbox hasn't worked since purchased and reported to support.
customer_reviews.text: Scans great directly to pc and scan to email is cool. However, the scan to Dropbox feature still doesn't work, has been reported to support and is a known issue. Since they have their own subscription storage, I don't feel they are in much of a hurry to fix it. Basically, if you want a great scanner this works great, but if you want the scan to Dropbox feature, forget it and look elsewhere in my opinion. If you plan on subscribing to their storage system, this will not matter.
customer_reviews.author: Kawboy718

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you need a long term solution
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for an owner. The techincal support is very bad, if you lock your account or try to get a new password, it takes days. The scanner will let you use it free for about 90 days and then you are required to purchase a service to keep it running. Not recommend to purchase. The biggest waste there is.
customer_reviews.author: Oakland Motel

customer_reviews.title: Good Scanner--Helpful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed using the NeatConnect, as it has definitely made my life easier, especially with regard to scanning receipts. It worked beautifully until a couple of weeks ago, when the scans began to blur in the middle of the scan. I contacted customer service and they promptly began to advise me on different ways to fix the issue. However, the scanner could not be fixed. They have already sent out a replacement at no cost. Thank you, Neat, for standing behind your product! It was a pleasure to work with the customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Woods

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Dropbox
customer_reviews.text: I actually love my Neat Scanner until it stopped scanning to DropBox. Customer Service told me 5 months ago that they would have an update to correct the situation. I would recommend not getting this for anything other than finances until that is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's going back! No listed phone numbers for tech ...
customer_reviews.text: It's going back! No listed phone numbers for tech support. Tech support is free for a short period of time, then they want to charge you to fix their own issues. Has a know glitch that prevents scanner from connecting to Dropbox. Do yourself a favor and stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Spost

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scanner and the speed of the product, however it doesn't integrate with other apps and you need to purchase the NEAT apps and pay monthly fees. There are other products in the market that you can purchase that will do a better job and no need for other costs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nassirian

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the fact that they make you subscribe to their ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the fact that they make you subscribe to their services when we only want to use locally. RIP OFF
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect but a couple drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: Fast scan. Good quality. No computer to worry about for my wife. Just scan and file the .pdf's later when you have time. E-mail or to the cloud. But, the keyboard on the screen is too small and is very hard to type correctly, so it is cumbersome to type in an e-mail address. Also, the paper sometimes gets stuck and doesn't feed well into the machine. Just straighten the paper back out and re-feed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Read

customer_reviews.title: Be ware when it says new
customer_reviews.text: No was not happy at all The unit was sold as new and when I went to use it there was some one else info in it and could not get it to work even calling neat Co and spending 2 hrs on the phone it did not work as it may have been returned for that reason . Should not have been sold for new
customer_reviews.author: bruce burton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Compatibility with Apple
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these scanners and have had continuous problems with them. Mostly with the software and drivers. Every time my Mac OS systems upgrades i loose the ability to scan. It takes neat a long time to update drivers and software to be compatible. I do not recommend this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and even better
customer_reviews.text: IT does everything as advertised and proves that Neat has come a long way in a few short years. We have four of these now and we love them at our offices. Has some quirks but overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: William Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I had the old version and loved it. I am impressed with the upgraded features!
customer_reviews.author: Ttotty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match the hype so far
customer_reviews.text: Not loving it so far... doesn't work very well with receipts & software isn't great at working with the scanner and it does nothing to organize in any fashion. Super expensive scanner basically that I am on the verge of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Beware!! DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU LIVE IN THE USA
customer_reviews.text: I bought the NeatConnect in March. In less than 2 months, it is not working properly. There is a shade on the scanned document, so completely useless. I emailed them for a replacement but they said no replacement outside the US. I think Amazon or whoever that sells it should write in bold to warn overseas customers to KEEP AWAY !!!
customer_reviews.author: LAMCSK

customer_reviews.title: Scanning Problems
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues uploading my receipts after scanning. I went on live chat support and within about 10 minutes the problem was solved. Val was very professional and very easy to work with. I have found the Neat support staff to be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: don't like at all the problem that it always has with maintaining the papers right!!!
customer_reviews.author: MONICA P. SODEYAMA

customer_reviews.title: Awful Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Machine works fine in one office and not the other. Cannot get through to a live person for customer support, no return emails as well. Don't sell a product if you cannot deliver some type of support. This is going back. A major disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Occhipinti

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lack of documentation with the product was unanticipated. On-line guidance is confusing and difficult to access.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product! My only regret is not getting it sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who does any form of paperwork should get this! Digitize everything and claim back the real estate on your table :)
customer_reviews.author: May Young

customer_reviews.title: great scanner easy to use
customer_reviews.text: love this scanner, you do not need to connect to pc and it can send the scan to lo email, cloud storage, ftp sites etc. easy to use. takes paper of any length so those long receipts scan easily.
customer_reviews.author: serchend

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Order
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better. I had the earlier version of Neat and it also performed poorly, but at least it worked. I called Neat to ask about their updates and they told me this new model is a much better concept. Well, its not. The touch screen worked for about 3 weeks, now it "might" work every few days if I keep turning it on and off. Unfortunately it looks like I am stuck with this $500 paperweight because I missed the return date. What a disappointment. I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient to use since it doesn't require a computer
customer_reviews.text: This scanner replaced a portable Canon P-215 duplex scanner and really like the computer-less feature. I scan my documents and can directly upload to an online cloud storage service or email it to a recipient directly from the scanner via a WiFi connection. This has made my scanning more efficient and quicker. It supports the major cloud storages including Dropbox, Onedrive, Google Drive, and Evernote. The only negative is the paper feeding mechanism is sometimes not perfect and will skew or crease papers when not fed properly. This happens only on a few occasions and hope it is because of the actual type of paper being fed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fan

customer_reviews.title: Auto document feeder poor
customer_reviews.text: The automatic paper feeder for documents does not work well at all. Called the manufacturer and they couldn't help.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Great scan solution for your receipts
customer_reviews.text: easy setup, and easy to orginize. scans perfectly, even small receipts. very impressed
customer_reviews.author: sharkpuck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Doesn't work. Papers do not feed. I cannot get replacement so I am out of the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Riley Ralls

customer_reviews.title: Fast, simple, dependable
customer_reviews.text: Really nice scanner and software. I could not be happier. Super easy set-up and extremely easy to use! It scans fast (and both sides)! I would definitely recommend.this product.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I didnt open The product inmediatly when I received it, now Is TOO late To return it and it has so many problems connecting to the Internet, it takes forever to scan.. It's so complicated that anything else is easier to use (a photograph with my phone)
customer_reviews.author: Anirays Camino

customer_reviews.title: Cloud feature not so good. I wound up connecting it direct to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Cloud feature not so good. I wound up connecting it direct to my PC was having network issues. But that was on me with multiple subnets. Other than that works great. Even scans old expired credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Unstatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Wifi scanning is only to cloud services
customer_reviews.text: The wireless option is misleading as it only allows you to scan to a cloud service, not to your machines on your network. To scan to your machines inside your network you have to connect the scanner via USB port... the reason for spending the extra money for the wireless model was to avoid another USB cable and keep the footprint on my desk minimal
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Darrah

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the product. It will not do what the Neat Company Rep stated it would do, without purchasing ICloud service.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MCMILLAN

customer_reviews.title: Paper jams up and integration with dropbox does not work
customer_reviews.text: Paper jams up in receipts tray No telephone support and even web ticketing process is complicated. Integration with email and dropbox does not work
customer_reviews.author: Shefali Pangasa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Everything is too slow and complicated for me with this scanner... sorry
customer_reviews.author: IF

customer_reviews.title: The ability for the scanner to recognize paper is a hit and miss ...bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is too expensive and it is not doing the basic task of scanning consistently. When it does work, it works like a charm. For me, every other time, I have to switch off and on again for the paper to be recognized. It is becoming a nightmare to use this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas Ganti

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool. Very fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool. Very fast. My only complaint is that it struggles a certain brand of plain printer paper that a vendor sends us. I wish I knew the brand -- it seems like a normal piece of paper, but only their invoice get jammed in this device.
customer_reviews.author: VanZan

customer_reviews.title: Technology i am looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Very good design of hardware and software. Just does what is intended for! With only one click, documents are in my private cloud. No need for a separate PC. User interface is designed so simple. Congratulations who made this product..
customer_reviews.author: Gokhan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out how use it . There are no instructions that come with it. Hard to find a custermer service number. Not veery user friendly
customer_reviews.author: francis charette

customer_reviews.title: I just submitted a bad review, but then I searched the packaging again ...
customer_reviews.text: I just submitted a bad review, but then I searched the packaging again and found the activation card code, it was not in the right slot, was hidden. Do not know how to remove the bad review. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK AS DESCRIED. TOO MANY TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES
customer_reviews.text: WORST PRODUCT EVER. DOES NOT WORK AS DESCRIBED! BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rahrle

customer_reviews.title: Can't read word clearly
customer_reviews.text: Speed scan but poor read, can not read the words clearly almost. Attached photo, you can't read the name & phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Poor service if you don't persist. Ultimately got what I needed but it was not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Georganne B

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back --- don't buy this  And horrible customer service as an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in January 2014. Immediately got it connected to Neat's cloud and my Dropbox but not my email. Each time I tried to connect to my email I got a message that my password was incorrect -- it wasn't Two weeks later, I couldn't connect with my Dropbox. Tried to call customer service but they don't want to talk to you so you have to email them. But they never respond. Have spent my business partner's time, other staff time, my IT consultant's time and my time to figure out what's wrong and still no help from NEAT. Run away fast -- very fast. I want a refund
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Bought it, kept it - but hate it more every day
customer_reviews.text: the installation on my mac was a night mare. The software calculates wrong prices so it is completely useless - at least for us.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Karp

customer_reviews.title: It is like a mini assistant without the assistant
customer_reviews.text: If you do not have a Neat, you NEED to purchase one NOW! It is like a mini assistant without the assistant.. life is just so much better. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Viola

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I took it out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I took it out of the box and it seamlessly connected to my Wi-Fi and pre set up neat Cloud account.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon263

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty neat scanner.. haven't try it yet but looks like it will do its job.. I'll update it later
customer_reviews.author: razenstar08

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product just have to learn how to best utilize it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J Accardi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner - life changing - it really helps with to get your admin / paper work organized
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

product_meta.title: NeatConnect Cloud Scanner and Digital Filing System for PC and Mac, 6003875
product_meta.description:
Scan and organize without a computer.View larger THE NEATCONNECT CLOUD SCANNER AND DIGITAL FILING SYSTEM
A whole new way to get organized. NeatConnect transforms paper into digital files and sends them straight to the cloud--without a computer. At home or at the office, NeatConnect sends your files straight to NeatCloud, the Neat mobile app, email, or wherever else they need to be.

SCAN STRAIGHT TO NEATCLOUD (SUBSCRIPTION INCLUDED)
Send items directly to NeatCloud, where your information becomes secure, useful, and usable. Create reports, edit data, and share files from anywhere, with NeatCloud and the Neat mobile app. Add e-receipts, forward emails, and import PDFs and image files into Neat. Neat extracts key data from everything you scan, making it easy to find, use, and share. Securely sync your Neat files--access them on your desktop, mobile device, or online. Create spending, tax and expense reports, share folders, and comment on shared items.

THE NEAT DIGITAL FILING SYSTEM
Cloud, mobile, and desktop--Neat provides one ecosystem for all your important information. Neat transforms your digital and paper documents into useful, organized information. This integrated system of software, hardware, cloud service, and mobile app makes it easy to acquire, search, share, and access your most important information, anywhere, anytime. Organize your information, simplify your life.


Easy, intuitive touchscreen interface.View larger A TOUCH OF ORGANIZATION
You don't need a computer to use NeatConnect, because everything is driven by the easy, intuitive touchscreen interface. From any room in your house, or any spot in the office, scanning is as simple as loading your paper, swiping through to your destination, and tapping Scan. Select one- or two-sided scanning, save each page separately or combined, and scan anything exactly the way you want it. Send scanned items as attachments in one easy step, right from NeatConnect.

Securely sync your Neat files. SCAN DIRECTLY TO POPULAR CLOUD SERVICES
The NeatConnect scanner scans directly to many popular cloud services, including SkyDrive, Evernote, Dropbox, Box. net, and Google Drive. You can also send scans via email and FTP.

A Neat mobile app available for iOS and Android devices. NEATCLOUD MOBILE APP AVAILABLE
A Neat mobile app available for iOS and Android devices. The Neat mobile application supports image capture, edit, sort, search, share, and expense reporting and reading of U.S. and Canadian receipts and business cards.

Don't let paper pile up in your home or office. FREEDOM FROM CLUTTER
Don't let paper pile up in your home or office. With NeatConnect, it’s easy to stay on top of things, transforming paper into digital files and keeping your space neatly organized.

Spend less time messing with paper. TAKE BACK YOUR TIME
Tracking expenses, getting ready for taxes, or finding a file when you need it--Neat makes dealing with paper faster and easier than ever before. Spend less time messing with paper, and more time doing what matters to you.

Organized, searchable, and backed up. ORGANIZE EVERYTHING
You'll always know where to find an important document when you have Neat. Organized, searchable, and backed up to NeatCloud, your files have never been in a better place.
feature_bullets: Scan your important info straight to the Cloud, purchase includes 3 free months of NeatCloud (available for a nominal monthly fee after initial trial expiration)
ScaScan in receipts to create expense reports and searchable databases
Scan in business cards to capture information, send info to address book, sync contacts with your phone
Scan in documents to create searchable pdfs, capture editable text, organize your digital files
Send scanned items as attachments in one easy step right from NeatConnect to email, DropBox, Evernote, ftp, Box.com, etc

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars254 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
